Name: Average time from Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE to Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Average time from Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR to Request Payment
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' and activity 'Request Payment'

Name: Total time spent on Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR across all cases
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR and the end of the case

Name: Average waiting time before Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR after Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' and activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Average time to complete Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR grouped by org:resource
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' and the end of case grouped by the last value of org:resource

Name: Minimum time taken for Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR to be followed by Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' and activity 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Total resolution time of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR in cases where Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER follows
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' and activity 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER'

Name: Average time between Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR and Payment Handled in successful claims
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' and activity 'Payment Handled'

Name: Average time it takes from Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR to the next activity in the process
Metric: The average of the duration between activity Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR and the end of the case

Name: Average time for Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR in domestic declaration processes
Metric: The average of the duration between activity Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR and the end of the case

Name: Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR Cycle Time in the context of the entire university in 2018
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR and the end of the case

Name: Total time for Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR in processes ending with Declaration REJECTED by MISSING
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' and activity 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING'

Name: Minimum resolution time of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR in processes with prior permission required
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR and the end of the case
